forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
